text:
PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE FROM THE AIRCRAFT. THANK YOU.
WINTER EDITION 2025

2
DEAR CUSTOMER,
Thank you for choosing to fly Ryanair. Sit back, relax,  
and let our Cabin Crew take care of you.
SHOP, SAVE & INDULGE –  
STRAIGHT TO YOUR SEAT
Our onboard shopping has never been easier!  
With the Ryanair App, you can order food, drinks,  
gifts, and duty-free straight to your seat—no need to wait 
for the trolley. Whether you're hungry for a delicious panini, 
looking for a luxury fragrance, or searching for  
a last-minute Christmas gift, you’ll find everything you 
need on board. Download the Ryanair App before  
take-off to shop smarter. More details are on page 3.
CHRISTMAS GIFTS MADE EASY
Take advantage of unbeatable prices and pick up the 
perfect treat for yourself or someone special. 
Tick off your gift list with these exclusive festive offers 
—perfect for loved ones or a little treat for yourself.
• Fragrance Favourites: This season’s Runway Retail 
favourite—Valentino 'Valentina'—is just €50.00 (save 
50%) on page 23.
• New Season:  Dsquared2 Icon for him and her are 
exciting new additions and at just €40.00 (save 20%).
• Gifting Made Easy: Check out pages 20 & 21 for our  
top fragrance picks like YSL 'Y' for men for €77.00, 
 or the Morphe Pallet at just €29.00.
• Stocking fillers Sorted: Find incredible €20 & €30 
fragrances (pages 12 & 13) or pick up must-have 
cosmetics and skincare—Moroccanoil, or Elizabeth  
Arden creams—all €20 or less.
• Exclusive Onboard Savings: Watch out for our special 
price promotions all winter, including our special Black 
Friday and January Sale discounts and an extra 10% off our 
Product of the Month, or a €1 scratchcard with any purchase! 
Ask our Cabin Crew or check the App for today’s offers.
• Flying to a Duty-Free destination? Don’t miss out  
on our unbeatable savings (pages 10 & 11).
FEELING HUNGRY?
We’ve packed our Getaway Café menu with delicious 
options for every appetite.
• €12.50 Meal Deal – Great Value, Big Taste (page 2).
• Hot & Hearty: Try our Three-Cheese Toastie or famous 
Ham & Cheese Panini.
• Snacks You’ll Love: Our delicious new Fairfields Crisps 
(page 9) or something sweet like Skittles from page 8.
• Sip & Celebrate: Indulge in a Bottega Rosé Prosecco 
(page 16) or our new beer brands Stella and Corona  
page 18—there’s something for everyone.
FEELING LUCKY?
Try your luck with our scratch cards—support great  
causes and win exciting prizes!
• Prizes include instant cash prizes of up to €10,000,  
a brand-new car, or on board vouchers worth  
up to €10!
• You could win the ultimate jackpot—a possible  
€1 MILLION in our annual draw.
• Look out for our €1 scratch card deal with any  
on board purchase.
More details on pages 6 & 7 or in the Ryanair App  
under 'About onboard products'.
HAVE A GREAT FLIGHT!
We’re delighted to have you on board. If there’s anything 
our Cabin Crew can do to make your journey more 
enjoyable, just ask.
Wishing you and your families a joyful, travel-filled 
Holiday Season. 
Aoife Greene
Deputy Director of Ancillary Revenue & Head of Retail
WARMEST WELCOME!
3
Siamo lieti di offrirvi una selezione 
di articoli molto apprezzati da 
scoprire durante il volo. 
Concedetevi un momento di relax 
con una tazza di caffè Lavazza, 
sperimentate la fragranza delicata 
ed elegante di Calvin Klein Sheer 
Beauty oppure godetevi una dolce 
pausa con una confezione di 
Skittles. Per qualsiasi richiesta,  
non esitate a rivolgervi al nostro 
personale di cabina.
Usiądź wygodnie i zrelaksuj się – 
mamy dla Ciebie kilka ulubionych 
propozycji! Sięgnij po rozgrzewającą 
herbatę Getaway Café, skosztuj 
smacznie chrupiącej kanapki z 
kurczakiem w pysznym panini z 
ziarnami, albo wznieś toast za  
podróż kieliszkiem Bottega  
Prosecco. Jeśli coś wzbudzi Twoje 
zainteresowanie, nasza załoga z 
przyjemnością pomoże, doradzi  
i poda, co trzeba.
¿Te apetece algo para disfrutar 
durante el vuelo? Tenemos 
justo lo que necesitas. 
Refresca tu viaje con una 
botella de agua sin gas San 
Benedetto, relájate con una 
Corona bien fría o disfruta 
del sabor clásico de Pringles. 
¡Simplemente pregúntale a 
nuestra tripulación de cabina 
si te gustaría probar alguno  
de estos favoritos a bordo!

FOR YOUR 
CONVENIENCE

5
Ryanair Gift Cards – the perfect gift for all occasions!
Personalise your gift card with a range of everyday and 
seasonal themes, from Happy Birthday, Congratulations, 
Thanks, Graduation and Merry Christmas - all starting from 
€25. With over 250 destinations to choose from, there’s 
somewhere for everyone!
Choose a digital gift card sent via email with a scheduled 
delivery time or a physical gift card delivered
straight to your doorstep.
 
To purchase, simply visit Ryanair.com
or scan the QR code.
Scan the QR code
HELPFUL THINGS YOU 
NEED TO KNOW
PAYMENT
In the interest of safety and convenience Ryanair is a  
100 % cashless airline. Cash, cheques or traveller's cheques 
are not accepted onboard our aircraft. All major Credit and 
Debit cards including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, 
Diners Club and Discover are accepted using contactless 
and Chip & Pin payment methods. All other card types may 
only be accepted if they are set up in your Google Pay or 
Apple Pay wallets on your smart phone. Customers can 
choose to pay in EUR, GBP or PLN.
As part of our on board payment process, boarding cards and 
identification will be requested and recorded for all fragrances, 
cosmetics and Duty-Free purchases in order to complete your 
payment. Please check your goods at the time of purchase, 
as errors cannot be rectified afterwards. Please note that 
we monitor all prices and exchange rates, and these are 
subject to change. All products are sold by Ryanair DAC.
RECEIPTS
To reduce the use of paper on board, all receipts  
for your inflight purchases can be retrieved from  
www.ryanairreceipts.com
SPACE  
RESTRICTIONS
As space is limited, we have to restrict the number  
of items we carry. Please accept our apologies  
if your first choice is not available on board today.  
Your Cabin Crew are familiar with all items we  
have in stock, and will happily help you choose  
an alternative.
EXCHANGES
Please refer to the product warranty card in each  
of the gadgets and accessory products for information  
on how to get an exchange or refund on faulty goods 
from the supplier. For more information on refunds  
go to the 'Help-Section' on the Ryanair website.  
This does not affect your statutory rights.
RELAX
Now just sit back, relax, and enjoy your flight!

CHARITY SPOTLIGHT
NAOMI HOUSE & JACKSPLACE
"This generous donation has helped us 
to provide valuable care and support to 
children and young people with life-limiting 
and life-threatening conditions."
As Europe’s No.1 airline, Ryanair is committed to giving back to charities and organisations that truly have impact in the 
countries and communities they serve. Ryanair’s Scratch Card programme supports the following charity partners; Fundaçã Do Gil 
(Portugal), Fundacja Dzieciom (Poland), Jack and Jill Children’s Foundation (Ireland), Kinderhilfe (Germany), Make-A-Wish (Belgium), 
Make-A-Wish (Italy), Naomi House and Jacksplace (England), Pequeño Deseo (Spain), Puttinu Cares (Malta), Refúgio Aboim Ascensão 
(Portugal), Make-A-Wish (France) and Niños Contra el Cáncer (Spain).

RYANAIR AND THE ENVIRONMENT
We support the 2015 Paris Agreement, Destination 2050, the United Nations Global Compact and the 17 UN 
Sustainable Development Goals. Here are some examples of our recent sustainable aviation commitments.
We announced the extension of our partnership with Trinity 
College Dublin out to the end of the decade. We will make 
a further €2.5m donation (€4m total) to fund the Ryanair 
Sustainable Aviation Research Centre. 
The Research Centre examines Sustainable Aviation Fuel 
(SAF), zero carbon aircraft propulsion systems and non-CO2 
Emissions.
We have retrofitted 60% of our Boeing 737-800NG fleet 
with split scimitar winglet technology (target 409 by 2026). 
These winglets reduce carbon emissions and fuel burn by 
approximately 1.5%, while lowering take off noise by over 6% 
and decreasing NOx emissions by 8%.
Ryanair has long campaigned for EU reform to ensure Air 
Traffic Control (ATC) centers are fully staffed but ATC delays 
are getting worse. Ryanair calls on all passengers to visit 
the ‘Air Traffic Control Ruined Your Flight’ webpage 
(www.atcruinedourholiday.com) and demand that national 
Transport Ministers take action to properly manage and staff 
their national ATC services to avoid unnecessary ATC delays 
and unnecessary emissions.
SAF can reduce greenhouse gas emissions by up to 80%. 
We have an industry leading target of 12.5% of our 2030 fuel 
requirements coming from SAF. This summer, Ryanair is using 
a 2% SAF blend at European Union and UK airports
*Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) is the term for all aviation fuels that, unlike conventional aviation fuel, are produced without the use of fossil feedstocks such as crude 
oil, and also meet established sustainability criteria. The SAF used by Ryanair meets the requirements of the European Union’s Renewable Energy Directive II (RED II). 
Using SAF results in a reduction in carbon emissions compared to the traditional jet fuel it replaces over the lifecycle of the fuel. Emission reductions are predominately 
achieved during the production process and through the use of sustainable feedstocks. The emissions from its combustion in an aircraft engine are effectively the same 
as those of fossil fuels.

33
TAN-LUXE
THE FACE
The revolutionary, multi-award winning self-tan drops 
from TAN-LUXE transforms your favourite moisturiser 
into a tailor-made tan that you control. Organic tanning 
actives blended with raspberry oil, vitamin E and aloe 
vera work with your own skin tone to deliver a natural 
looking radiant tan that lasts for up to seven days.  
Use two drops for radiance, four drops for sun-kissed, 
eight drops for golden and twelve drops for bronze. 
These drops are a concentrate and must always be 
mixed with a moisturiser as directed.  
No streaks. No smells. No drama. 
20 ml
€27.00
EGYPTIAN MAGIC
ALL PURPOSE  
SKIN CREAM
This all-purpose, all-natural balm is made from  
six of nature's most powerful moisturising and 
healing ingredients. Use as a facial moisturiser  
and eye cream, hair conditioner, lip balm, nail  
and cuticle conditioner, and to treat conditions  
like eczema, psoriasis and atopic dermatitis. Its 
formula also makes it perfect for helping to fade 
scars, heal blemishes and prevent stretch marks. 
75  ml
€34.00

GOOD NIGHT'S SLEEP  
RESTORING CREAM 
Soothing the skin, relaxing the senses. Good Night’s Sleep  
is enriched with powerful natural extracts known to calm  
and comfort skin. The soft, aromatic scent of lavender, 
honeysuckle and orange helps ease away the cares of  
the day to promote a restful sleep. 
50 ml 
€20.00
MOROCCANOIL
HAIR TREATMENT  
A versatile, argan oil-infused hair 
treatment and styler that promotes 
softer, stronger hair with increased shine 
and less frizz. The non-greasy and fast-
absorbing formula is fragranced with the 
signature Moroccanoil scent, a blend of 
spicy amber and warm florals. Use before 
styling or as needed for quick conditioning 
or touch-ups. For all hair types.  
25 ml
€15.00
ELIZABETH ARDEN
VISIBLE DIFFERENCE REFINING MOISTURE 
CREAM COMPLEX
This travel exclusive size offers a rich cream that cushions skin  
with moisture and provides an occlusive barrier to prevent moisture 
loss. The formula will restore smoothness, with 94% of women seeing 
a dramatic improvement in skin’s hydration.* It also improves clarity, 
texture and tone and adds radiance. *Based on a 3-week consumer 
study of 52 women.
